level.heading: Judicial review.
level.text: Any order or decision of the Mayor shall be subject to review in accordance with § 2-510, at the request of any person suffering a legal wrong or whose interests are adversely affected or aggrieved by the order or decision of the Mayor.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-43, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-2101.
